products.name: iPhone 12 Pro
products.detail: The iPhone 12 Pro is a high-end smartphone developed by Apple Inc. and was released in October 2020. It features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display with a resolution of 2532x1170 pixels, offering a high level of clarity and color accuracy. The device is powered by Apple's A14 Bionic chip, which is designed to deliver exceptional performance, making it one of the most powerful smartphones available in the market.

products.name: Airpods Pro
products.detail: AirPods Pro are a type of wireless earbuds manufactured by Apple. They are an upgraded version of the original AirPods and feature several advanced features such as noise cancellation, a customizable fit, and water and sweat resistance.The AirPods Pro come with three sizes of soft, silicone ear tips that can be easily swapped out to ensure a secure and comfortable fit.

products.name: M1 Macbook Air
products.desc: Apple Macbook air with apple silicon
products.detail: The MacBook Air is a line of lightweight and ultra-portable laptops designed and manufactured by Apple Inc. The first MacBook Air was introduced in 2008 and since then, it has undergone several design and hardware upgrades.The MacBook Air is known for its sleek, thin and lightweight design, making it easy to carry around. The latest MacBook Air models have a thickness of just 0.63 inches (1.61 cm).
